prompts: Create a fierce fire-type Pokemon with a fiery tail and a sharp snout.
Imagine a bipedal Pokemon that can spit flames and has a playful personality.
Design a medium-sized creature with orange skin and a bold attitude.
Show me a Pokemon that thrives in urban areas and loves to battle.
Generate a Pokemon with a unique blend of orange and cream colors.
Make a creature that evolves from a small lizard into a powerful dragon.
Give me a fire Pokemon that has a knack for surprising its opponents.
